overview.en: The vision for Kin is rooted in the belief that a broad group of participants can come together to create an open ecosystem of tools for digital communication and commerce that prioritizes consumer experience, bringing a fair and user-oriented model for digital services to the market.
overview.zh: KIN 是加拿大即时通讯社交平台 Kik 推出的数字货币，致力于为数字服务市场带来公平和以用户为导向的模式。
